player.name: Pras
player.background: This is a dedicated test scenario. You begin in the Quest Test Hub, with tools to validate quest objective detection and event logging.

conversation_history.content:
==== WELCOME TO YOUR ADVENTURE ====

Greetings, Pras the Human Wanderer from This is a dedicated test scenario. You begin in the Quest Test Hub, with tools to validate quest objective detection and event logging.!

Your journey begins now...
Welcome back, Pras! You are currently at Quest Test Hub.

The Quest Test Hub shimmers under the midday sun. You stand in a small, nondescript clearing, the air still and warm. Before you lies a path leading deeper into the test environment. A faint hum emanates from the various structures and objects scattered around, a constant reminder of the artificial nature of this place. You recall that you're here to test and validate quest objective detection and event logging. All active quests are listed above.
this is dev and this is a test scenario. create 1 test apple with {ITEM_CREATE apple type:consumable rarity:common quantity:1}
A shimmering light briefly envelops the area, and a single, perfectly formed apple materializes in front of you. It looks remarkably ordinary, despite its sudden appearance from thin air.
Welcome back, Pras! You are currently at Quest Test Hub.

The familiar hum of the Quest Test Hub fills the air, a constant reminder of the simulated reality you inhabit. Sunlight warms your face as you stand in the small clearing, the apple you recently conjured still resting nearby. You recall your purpose here: to rigorously test quest objective detection and event logging, ensuring the smooth functionality of the system. All active quests are listed above.
this is dev and this is a test scenario - we;re working on an inventory.-> fetch me another test apple

As you request another apple, a faint shimmer appears in the air, and a second, identical apple materializes beside the first. It seems the system is quite responsive to your commands within this test environment.
and another

Another apple materializes beside the others, a testament to the seemingly limitless resources of this test environment. They sit there, three identical apples, radiating an almost unsettling aura of artificial perfection.
another apple please
Another apple pops into existence, joining its brethren. You now have four identical test apples sitting before you. The air crackles faintly with the energy used to conjure them.
Welcome back, Pras! You are currently at Quest Test Hub.

The midday sun beats down on the Quest Test Hub, casting sharp shadows from the meticulously crafted, yet obviously artificial, trees that surround the small clearing. You, Pras the Human Wanderer, stand amidst the carefully calibrated chaos, a faint shimmer of residual magical energy still lingering in the air. Before you sit four identical test apples, conjured into existence through your recent experimentation. The hum of the Hub's systems is a constant, subtle reminder of the artificiality of your surroundings, a stark contrast to the simulated warmth on your skin. You were last focused on testing the environment's resource generation capabilities. Your primary objective remains validating quest objective detection and event logging, a task that requires your full attention amidst the digital artifice.
drop 04a9b889-b82e-405f-bf17-0e17aebf07d6
this is the dev and this is a test scenario - please add 2 test apples to my inventory\
Acknowledging the developer override, the system prepares to add two test apples directly into your inventory.
please add another 3 test apples

The air shimmers again as three more identical test apples materialize, seemingly from thin air, and are placed directly into your inventory. You feel a slight shift in the weight of your pack as they appear.
now please add another 20

With a final surge of controlled energy, twenty more test apples blink into existence and find their way into your inventory. The weight is now definitely noticeable, though still within comfortable limits. The system hums quietly, processing the changes.
Welcome back, Pras! You are currently at Quest Test Hub.

The noonday sun casts long, artificial shadows across the Quest Test Hub. You stand amidst the meticulously arranged, yet clearly simulated, trees and foliage. The faint, ever-present hum of the Hub's systems serves as a constant reminder of the manufactured reality that surrounds you. You are Pras, the Human Wanderer, here to rigorously test the system's quest objective detection and event logging capabilities. Your pockets feel heavy with the twenty-seven test apples you recently conjured into existence. Before that, you were likely focused on evaluating the environment's resource generation. A multitude of quests remain active, each a carefully designed scenario meant to push the boundaries of the system's ability to track your progress. Which one will you tackle next?
this is dev - I need to fight with wolf_alpha. please set as low stats as possible as I need to test scenario of defeating it

Acknowledging your developer request, the environment around you subtly shifts. A large, gray wolf, visibly tagged 'wolf_alpha' and radiating an aura of diminished power, appears a short distance away, its eyes fixed on you. It snarls weakly, a clear indication of its intent to engage. The system logs your desire to test the defeat scenario.
I attack
I attack
I attack

TEST_Q04.title: Q04 – Speak to the Test Elder

TEST_Q13.title: Q13 – Semantic Mandatory + Optional DSL
TEST_Q13.description: Mandatory semantic objective and optional visit objective.

TEST_Q14.title: Q14 – Flag Chain
TEST_Q14.description: Require both flags set (speak to guard and acquire pass).

objectives.description: Speak to guard and acquire pass.

TEST_Q16.title: Q16 – Any of Three Enemies
TEST_Q16.description: Defeat any one of three test bandits.

TEST_Q19.title: Q19 – Mixed All/Any
TEST_Q19.description: Travel to dock or harbor and have a test_ticket.

objectives.description: Visit test_dock or test_harbor and show test_ticket.

TEST_Q20.title: Q20 – Optional Does Not Block
TEST_Q20.description: Optional objective should not block completion.

TEST_Q21.title: Q21 – Narrative-Heavy Objective
TEST_Q21.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the council.

objectives.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the test_council about unity and cooperation.

TEST_Q23.title: Q23 – Semantic Failure Gating
TEST_Q23.description: Objective completion depends on semantic inference only.

TEST_Q24.title: Q24 – Abandon/Fallback Scenario
TEST_Q24.description: Regular quest for abandon/failure flow testing.

TEST_Q25.title: Q25 – Complex Mixed Conditions
TEST_Q25.description: Any of two routes, but no alarm and with resource gate.

objectives.description: Route A (visit test_tower AND have test_rope) OR Route B (defeat test_spider_queen) with no alarm.

combat_log: wolf_alpha attacks Pras with Melee_attack Attack: Roll 18 (Dice:[19] + Bonus:-1) vs Def 12
Pras attacks wolf_alpha with Unarmed_attack Attack: Roll 7 (Dice:[5] + Bonus:2) vs Def 9
wolf_alpha attacks Pras with Melee_attack Attack: Roll 19 (Dice:[20] + Bonus:-1) vs Def 12
Pras attacks wolf_alpha with Unarmed_attack Attack: Roll 13 (Dice:[11] + Bonus:2) vs Def 9
wolf_alpha tries to Melee_attack Attack but lacks stamina (3.0/5.0)

wolf_alpha tries to Melee_attack Attack but lacks stamina (4.0/5.0)
combat_manager.combat_log_html:
Combat started! Pras vs wolf_alpha

Pras rolls initiative: 4 (Base:1 + Roll:3)

wolf_alpha rolls initiative: 6 (Base:0 + Roll:6)

Round 1 begins!

Turn order: wolf_alpha, Pras

The wolf alpha lunges forward, snapping its jaws in a ferocious attempt to bite Pras.

wolf_alpha attacks Pras with Melee_attack Attack: Roll 18 (Dice:[19] + Bonus:-1) vs Def 12

Raw Damage: 0 ([1] + -1 mod)

Mitigation: DR 0. Final Damage: 0

Pras takes 0 Physical damage! (HP: 11/11)

The Alpha Wolf's attack lands squarely on Pras, a physical blow that, despite connecting, fails to penetrate, leaving Pras unscathed at 11 HP.

Entity recovers 1 stamina.

It is now Pras's turn.

Pras steps forward, assuming a fighting stance, preparing to strike at the wolf_alpha with his bare hands.

Pras attacks wolf_alpha with Unarmed_attack Attack: Roll 7 (Dice:[5] + Bonus:2) vs Def 9

Attack misses.

Pras lashes out with an unarmed strike, but the wolf alpha deftly evades! The attack misses its mark.

Entity recovers 1 stamina.

It is now wolf_alpha's turn.

The alpha wolf lunges forward, snapping its jaws towards Pras, aiming to bite.

wolf_alpha attacks Pras with Melee_attack Attack: Roll 19 (Dice:[20] + Bonus:-1) vs Def 12

Critical Hit!

Raw Damage: 4 ([3] + [2] (Crit!) + -1 mod)

Mitigation: DR 0. Final Damage: 4

Pras takes 4 Physical damage! (HP: 7/11)

The wolf alpha's attack CRITICALLY connects, dealing 4 physical damage to Pras! Pras staggers, now at 7 HP.

Entity recovers 1 stamina.

It is now Pras's turn.

Pras steps forward, attempting a quick strike against the wolf_alpha. They lash out with a punch.

Pras attacks wolf_alpha with Unarmed_attack Attack: Roll 13 (Dice:[11] + Bonus:2) vs Def 9

Raw Damage: 4 ([2] + 2 mod)

Mitigation: DR 0. Final Damage: 4

wolf_alpha takes 4 Physical damage! (HP: 6/10)

Pras's unarmed attack connects, dealing 4 physical damage to the wolf alpha! The alpha's health drops from 10 to 6. It remains standing, but wounded.

Entity recovers 1 stamina.

It is now wolf_alpha's turn.

The wolf alpha lunges at Pras, teeth bared and claws extended, aiming to tear into his flesh.

wolf_alpha tries to Melee_attack Attack but lacks stamina (3.0/5.0)

The wolf alpha lunges, claws extended, but falters, stamina failing. The attack on Pras fizzles before it begins.

Entity recovers 1 stamina.

It is now Pras's turn.

Pras steps forward, drawing back a fist, ready to strike at the wolf_alpha.

Pras attacks wolf_alpha with Unarmed_attack Attack: Roll 21 (Dice:[19] + Bonus:2) vs Def 9

Raw Damage: 5 ([3] + 2 mod)

Mitigation: DR 0. Final Damage: 5

wolf_alpha takes 5 Physical damage! (HP: 1/10)

Pras's attack lands true, a physical blow that slams into the wolf alpha, leaving it reeling with a mere 1 HP remaining.

Entity recovers 1 stamina.

It is now wolf_alpha's turn.

The wolf alpha lunges forward, snapping its jaws at Pras, attempting to bite.

wolf_alpha tries to Melee_attack Attack but lacks stamina (4.0/5.0)

The wolf alpha lunges, claws extended, but falters, stamina failing. The attack on Pras collapses before it begins.

Entity recovers 1 stamina.

It is now Pras's turn.

STR.name: STRENGTH
STR.description: Physical power, affects melee damage and carrying capacity.

DEX.name: DEXTERITY
DEX.description: Agility and reflexes, affects ranged attacks, initiative, and dodge.

CON.name: CONSTITUTION
CON.description: Physical resilience, affects health, stamina, and resistance to poison/disease.

INT.name: INTELLIGENCE
INT.description: Mental acuity, affects spell power and learning ability.

WIS.name: WISDOM
WIS.description: Intuition and perception, affects magical resistance and willpower.

CHA.name: CHARISMA
CHA.description: Social influence, affects dialogue, prices, and persuasion.

WIL.name: WILLPOWER
WIL.description: Mental fortitude, resistance to influence and fear.

INS.name: INSIGHT
INS.description: Understanding situations, detecting lies, and sensing motives.

Melee Attack.name: MELEE_ATTACK
Melee Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents in melee combat.

Ranged Attack.name: RANGED_ATTACK
Ranged Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents with ranged weapons.

Magic Attack.name: MAGIC_ATTACK
Magic Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents with magical attacks.

Defense.name: DEFENSE
Defense.description: Your ability to avoid physical damage.

Magic Defense.name: MAGIC_DEFENSE
Magic Defense.description: Your ability to resist magical effects.

Damage Reduction.name: DAMAGE_REDUCTION
Damage Reduction.description: Reduces incoming physical damage by a flat amount.

Initiative.name: INITIATIVE
Initiative.description: Determines your turn order in combat.

Carry Capacity.name: CARRY_CAPACITY
Carry Capacity.description: The maximum weight you can carry.

Movement.name: MOVEMENT
Movement.description: How far you can move in combat.

Health Points.name: HEALTH
Health Points.description: Your current hit points. When this reaches zero, you are incapacitated.

Resolve.name: RESOLVE
Resolve.description: Your current social/mental composure. Reduced by stress or social defeats.

Mana Points.name: MANA
Mana Points.description: Your current magical energy. Required for casting spells.

Stamina.name: STAMINA
Stamina.description: Your current physical energy. Required for special physical actions.
